msbt.message: Thanks a bunch for delivering that present from Santa yesterday!I keep replayin' that moment in my mind over and over. It was a good moment, !
Thanks to you pickin' up the slack from Jingle yesterday, I had the SICKEST Toy Day! You rock!
Thanks for swappin' gifts with me yesterday! The one you gave me is my new favorite thing, !
I felt real good about swapping presents with you yesterday.The idea of you tryin' to come up with the right gift gave me a real charge, .
Gettin' presents from you AND from the big man himself made yesterday a Toy Day for the books.Thanks for pullin' double duty, !
Gettin' a present from you on top of the one from Santa was just gravy on the Toy Day cake.Not gonna lie, I teared up a little. I'm gonna treasure what you gave me for a long time, !
Yesterday was Toy Day, yeah? You do anything, y'know, Toy Day-y. to celebrate?Toy Day comes every year, but you can't let it go by without you. Gotta seize the chances you're given!

I had a good time swappin' presents with folks yesterday. But I guess you were busy with other stuff, huh?I like gettin' presents as much as the next gal, but a holiday without you ain't much of a holiday.
